rooms.description: Open-plan living and kitchen area, designed in a minimalist style with ample natural light and functional layout. Integrated smart home systems for ease of use. Vastu-compliant orientation by aligning east side for the entrance, south for cooking space.

Master bedroom with attached spacious balcony on the eastern side to promote natural light and positive energy. Minimalist decor with ample storage, Vastu-compliant north-east corner placement. Area: 200 sqft

Private gym area integrated into a compact zone within the living space or adjoining corridor. Fitted with modern fitness equipment and designed for flexibility. Adheres to minimalistic design principles.
Secondary bedroom featuring its own spacious balcony on the eastern side, ensuring a harmonious balance of light and energy as per Vastu norms. Area: 200 sqft
Ensuite bathroom for master bedroom with modern fixtures and efficient layout. Incorporates water element placements in accordance to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance designed with large glass doors to ensure natural light, adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the entrance in a positive energy direction.
